name: A KING'S TALE: FINAL FANTASY XV
summary: A King's Tale: Final Fantasy XV is a 2D, side-scrolling action brawler set 30 years before the events of Final Fantasy XV. It was revealed during a Square Enix Active Time Report at E3 2016 and is set to release alongside its companion game on November 29, 2016; it is a pre-order bonus exclusive to GameStop and EBgames in North America, GAME in the United Kingdom and Saraiva in Brazil. While the game is to be available in other regions, specific details have yet to be announced.
